title: Malibu Hard Water Wellness Treatment Kit, 9 oz Shampoo, 9 oz Conditioner and 0.17 Hard Water Treatment
description: Hard Water Wellness Kit is the number one defense system against malicious minerals and other elements hiding in your water. This 100% vegan total wellness kit is predictably popular as it instantly removes and prevents pesky buildup to unleash perfectly purified, weightless tresses and reveal unmatched shimmer and shine.

title: SJP NYC Eau De Toilette, 2-Fluid Ounce
description: A deliciously addictive and colorful fruity floral built around a vivacious wild strawberry accord with a cocktail of feminine florals and creamy sensual undertones. Topnotes — Italian Bergamot, White Osmanthus, Wild Red Strawberries Midnotes — Honeysuckled, Red Rose Damascenia, Mimosa Basenotes — Sandalwood, Vanilla, Rum, Creamy MusksWhen applying any fragrance please consider that there are several factors which can affect the natural smell of your skin and, in turn, the way a scent smells on you.  For instance, your mood, stress level, age, body chemistry, diet, and current medications may all alter the scents you wear.  Similarly, factor such as dry or oily skin can even affect the amount of time a fragrance will last after being applied

title: L'Oreal Paris Telescopic Shocking Extensions Mascara, Black, 0.29 Ounces
description: L'Oreal introduces liquid extensions in a bottle, with new telescopic shocking extensions mascara, a new generation of lash length. In one motion lashes are separated, intensified, and look shockingly lengthened for an intense make-up result.
